Even as both invasive fungal infections and fungal resistance to currently limited antifungal drugs are becoming more common, and there are several molecules being studied for a number of fungal diseases [ 15], there have not been any new antifungals approved for use in the USA since our last review in 2017. Some strains of Candida glabrata and auris implicated in disseminated disease are now multidrug resistant [ 16].
